title: Twisted Treeline Questions
body:
Are there any plans of putting a 10 champions ban system in 3v3?

The last patch changed champion select in 3v3 (twice), but wasn't noted in the patch notes, is this normal or I just missed it?

Thank you for taking the time to answer my questions :)

replies.body:
Mmmmmm I haven't actually heard anything personally about changing that up yet. I do believe we updated it a bit ago to allow everyone one ban at the same time, similar to Solo Q. Don't believe we'll be adding in 10 bans though.

[**SapMagic actually commented on this**](https://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/72rbyj/new_3v3_ban_system_is_even_worse/dnkzulf/) over on Reddit recently, so you may find it useLESS to join in the conversation!

EDIT: USEFUL!!!!!! I MEANT USEFUL NOT USELESS XD

> useless to join in the conversation

Is that what you meant to write there?

HNNNNNNGGGGG






I can always count on you all to point out my typos xD
